attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review:
i wish i could rate this monstrosity of an app zero stars. do not recommend at all 🙄🙄. if you support this orange twerp idk what the hell
is wrong with you. he is a monster, a rapist, and many other very terrible words. anyways this is probably one of the worst apps to ever be created and i’m very disappointed. it needs to be taken down IMMEDIATELY. it brought such pain to my eyes, i could not believe i was seeing this. mmcht a disgrace.

attributes.title: Release Barron Trump
attributes.review: This app was terrible. It kept crashing. It started making my phone slow in general. Ever since I got this app all my other apps starting crashing too. My phone now turns off for no reason. This app ruined my phone and destroyed the software. I expected better from the Cheeto man. Actually I lied, I didint expect better. There’s one way to improve this app🧚‍♀️🌟🥰just remove it from the app store🤩☺️✨

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS
attributes.review: once I downloaded it, it took days to finally download. During those days I kept getting messages from random numbers saying “trump 2020” and other things. And it just gets worse, once it finally downloaded it deleted itself again and then immediately started downloading which again took days. It’s like they never wanted me to get it in the first place.

attributes.title: WE STAND!
attributes.review:
TikTok is an app where teens/adults get to speak there mind and dhow there political views. We should be able to show our point of view regarding our country. And Trump is on mad because everyone was to BUSY to show up! Us underaged don’t get to show our opinions. And if you say it’s because of China, you’re only mad because TikTok users tricked you! We outsmarted them and now they’re mad! 
               ~that’s my opinion of the day~

attributes.title: This app ✨🌸🧚 should be abolished
attributes.review:
I’ve only had this app for a few minutes, but already have a few grievances with it:
1) it exists
2) the color scheme leaves something to be desired. Red, white, and blue is a classic, don’t get me wrong. But have you considered going with more orangey tones to complement Trump’s spray tan? 
3) upon opening the app, my phone began to blast the national anthem so loud into my earphones that my hearing is now impaired. Trump, you will be hearing from my lawyers.

attributes.title: 🖕🏾Donald Trump
attributes.review: Donald Trump is a disgrace to the human race and I feel sorry that his parents created such a waste of matter. He should be in jail for being the reason that so many have died of the coronavirus. He’s legit the worst president ever and to all the women out there that support him...YOU’RE STUPID!! He’s a misogynistic clown who said he’d date his daughter if she wasn’t his daughter... who in the world says that?! If you’re a Trump supporter...🖕🏾AND TO YOU TRUMP...YOU’RE A WASTE OF MATTER WHO GOT INTO COLLEGE BY PAYING PEOPLE TO DO YOUR WORK!

attributes.title: I CANT EVEN
attributes.review: Wow, this app is literally the worst app in the history of all apps, it glitched my phone so much and it doesn’t even work for me and I have the latest iPhone!!! And no joke, it seriously took several days to download and I know for a fact that it’s not because I have too many apps because I have PLENTY of storage left! Nothing of the app makes any sense, yes I support our president but no I do not support this app!!

attributes.title: DISGUSTING AND TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: This app took almost 3 whole days to download and in those 3 days it made my phone very very slow. Also it was making my room stink and caused my moms death. The rest of my family is now in the hospital including me. At the hospital the app started playing the song Let it Go. It didn’t sound normal though. Elsa’s voice was so deep and there was an evil laugh in the background. I think the app knows that it killed my mom. WORST APP EVER

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: This app took forever for me to download and when it was in the process of downloading, my phone continued to glitch and I was unable to do anything on my phone. Then once the app was downloaded, my whole phone was running significantly slower. I think there is something seriously wrong with the app since I have noticed others having the same problem I am.
